underlying_goal: Refactor a DSPy-based search agent to replace dspy.ReAct with a manual tool-handling pattern (ChainOfThought then corrected to Predict) to fix a 180s timeout issue in research_loop.py
friction_detail: Used dspy.ChainOfThought instead of dspy.Predict as specified, requiring a correction from team-lead; also initially missed passing tools to call.execute().
brief_summary: Team-lead instructed code-updater to refactor a DSPy ReAct agent to a manual tool-handling pattern to fix timeouts; after one approach correction (ChainOfThoughtâ†’Predict) and a bug fix, the refactor was completed successfully reducing runtime from 180s+ to ~45s.
